title: Star Guardian Mission Bug
body:
Okay so I completed 2 missions in 1 match of Onslaught ('A rank or higher' & 'S rank as a premade') and only got credit for the A rank mission.

[S rank mission isn't in my completed missions log.](https://i.imgur.com/KiHgSav.png)

[Checked Active mission list. Not there either.](https://i.imgur.com/TNjrSb4.jpg)

What's going on? Are we not allowed to complete more than 1 mission per match? Or is it a bug that needs fixing?

replies.body:
Hey RabidBurp! 

This is working as intended. You must complete A Guardian's Origins AND HARD-A Guardian's Trial before you're eligible to try for the S mission.
that is because you have not completed the missions before the S mission you were required to do
